speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is him. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: This is Sarah from XYZ Recovery. I'm calling about an outstanding balance on your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information, Mr. Smith. Can you also confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that. You currently have a balance of $650. How would you like to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment today. How do I do that?

speaker: Agent
text: We can process a payment over the phone or you can also pay online. Which would you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I'll pay online, that’s easier for me.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I will send you an email with the payment link shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Mr. Smith. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
